audioText: Si j'avais plus d'argent, je verrais un coiffeur professionnel chaque mois.
question: Si j'avais plus d'argent, je ______ un coiffeur professionnel chaque mois.
explanation: The missing word is 'verrais'. The complete sentence is 'Si j'avais plus d'argent, je verrais un coiffeur professionnel chaque mois' - If I had more money, I would see a professional hairdresser every month. 'Verrais' is the conditional form of 'voir' (to see), used in hypothetical situations.
